page.title: 08SHOPPING IN CUMNOCK
page.content: There are many shops in Cumnock. People from New Cumnock and other surrounding villages do their shopping in Cumnock.A few years ago a large Precinct was built in the centre of the town.It has many shops in it:- Semi-chem- chemist;McKays- clothes shop;Gregg's- Baker;Templeton- food store;Stanley's- paper shop; records and stationery shop;Victoria Wines - wines;A.T.Mays- Travel agents; Smart tots- Baby shop; Kenney's - mens shop; Malcolm Campbell- fruit shop; Seconds First- clothes shop; Ross's- T.V.shop; The Job Centre and Galloway's- Butcher and there is a wool shop for people who knit.The shopping needs of all are catered for.There are also some little shops in the older parts of the town.The outlying districts of the town,Barshare,Logan and Netherthird have small general stores of their own
